title: A gifted skin I cant use
body:
So my friend gifted me Blood Moon Jhin and its locked for me in my Champion Collection. How come I can't use it? I used it before.
My friend who gifted me was also permanently suspended just today so I dont know if that is related.

This shows my gifting history
https://gyazo.com/40debe5fa83cc35467e62c2262a48062

This shows Jhin and the skin is locked
https://gyazo.com/b706b985c599147e7d082f22de1319b2

replies.body: I had to do some digging but it looks like that skin was gifted by your friend, and that friend issued some chargebacks on that purchase. When he issued a chargeback and got refunded the money he spent, the skins he bought and sent were also refunded since the money was refunded.

Hello i am the friend that gifted him... i had asked riot for a refund because of the money i spent but they said that they couldnt do it because of their policy and that was last year and now i am permanently suspended for reasons i don't know.

I can't really go into much more detail here on the boards, but if you're confused about a ban your best bet is to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what's going on.

Same thing here just that my friend gifted me Project: Vayne.
I also doubt that she would have tried to refund the gift, but she did get banned at the time I lost my skin.
